<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Fly](/Monsters.aspx?ID=673)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This pony-sized fly's twitching limbs seem to never stop moving as it constantly cleans itself and scoops anything edible into its mouthparts. While primarily carrion eaters, giant flies sometimes prey on livestock or other animals too slow to get away.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Fly_GiantFly.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Giant Fly](/Monsters.aspx?ID=673)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Avoid the Swat** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The giant fly is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker it can see; **Effect** The giant fly gains a +2 circumstance bonus against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the giant insect can Fly up to its fly Speed.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +8,
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing plus fly pox

**Fly Pox**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162)) A giant fly could carry any disease, but most transmit a virulent but not fatal infection called Fly Pox with their bite; **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 day; **Stage 1** [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 day); **Stage 2** as stage 1 (1 day); **Stage 3** enfeebled 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** as stage 3; **Stage 5** enfeebled 2 and [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) (1 day)

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_4_RelatedCreatures.png">Fly Species</title>

The giant fly presented here is but the most common of these unsettlingly oversized pests. Others can grow much larger, such as the blood-drinking glutton fly, the highly toxic and foul-smelling blight fly, and the immensely bloated plague fly—a nauseating creature ironically incapable of flight that fattens itself on undead flesh and carries a host of awful diseases.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-136" />
